attribute: The comment tag does not support any standard attributes.

<abbr>.description: Defines an abbreviation or an acronym

<acronym>.description: Not supported in HTML5. Use <abbr> instead. Defines an acronym

<address>.description: Defines contact information for the author/owner of a document

<applet>.description: Not supported in HTML5. Use <embed> or <object> instead. Defines an embedded applet

<area>.description: Defines an area inside an image map

<aside>.description: Defines content aside from the page content

<base>.description: Specifies the base URL/target for all relative URLs in a document

<basefont>.description: Not supported in HTML5. Use CSS instead. Specifies a default color, size, and font for all text in a document

<bdi>.description: Isolates a part of text that might be formatted in a different direction from other text outside it

<big>.description: Not supported in HTML5. Use CSS instead. Defines big text

<blockquote>.description: Defines a section that is quoted from another source

<canvas>.description: Used to draw graphics, on the fly, via scripting (usually JavaScript)

<center>.description: Not supported in HTML5. Use CSS instead. Defines centered text

<cite>.description: Defines the title of a work

<code>.description: Defines a piece of computer code

<col>.description: Specifies column properties for each column within a <colgroup> element

<colgroup>.description: Specifies a group of one or more columns in a table for formatting

<data>.description: Adds a machine-readable translation of a given content

<datalist>.description: Specifies a list of pre-defined options for input controls

<dd>.description: Defines a description/value of a term in as description list

<del>.description: Defines text that has been deleted from a document

<details>.description: Defines additional details that the user can view or hide

<dfn>.description: Specifies a term that is going to be defined within the content

<dialog>.description: Defines a dialog box or window

<dir>.description: Not supported in HTML5. Use <ul> instead. Defines a directory list

<div>.description: Defines a section in a document

<dt>.description: Defines a term/name in a description list

<embed>.description: Defines a container for an external application

<fieldset>.description: Groups related elements in a form

<figcaption>.description: Defines a caption for a <figure> element

<font>.description: Not supported in HTML5. Use CSS instead. Defines font, color, and size for text

<footer>.description: Defines a footer for a document or section

<form>.description: Defines an HTML form for user input

<frame>.description: Not supported in HTML5. Defines a window (a frame) in a frameset

<frameset>.description: Not supported in HTML5. Defines a set of frames

<header>.description: Defines a header for a document or section

<hr>.description: Defines a thematic change in the content

<html>.description: Defines the root of an HTML document

<i>.description: Defines a part of text in an alternate voice or mood

<ins>.description: Defines a text that has been inserted into a document

<label>.description: Defines a label for an <input> element

<legend>.description: Defines a caption for a <fieldset> element

<link>.description: Defines the relationship between a document and an external resource (most used to link to style sheets)

<main>.description: Specifies the main content of a document

<marquee>.description: Se utiliza para insertar un area de texto en movimiento. Tambi√©n se la conoce como marquesina.

<meta>.description: Defines metadata about an HTML document

<meter>.description: Defines a scalar measurement within a known range (a gauge)

<noframes>.description: Not supported in HTML5. Defines an alternate content for users that do not support frames

<noscript>.description: Defines an alternate content for users that do not support client-side scripts

<object>.description: Defines a container for an external application

<optgroup>.description: Defines a group of related options in a drop-down list

<option>.description: Defines an option in a drop-down list

<output>.description: Defines the result of a calculation

<param>.description: Defines a parameter for an object

<picture>.description: Defines a container for multiple image resources

<progress>.description: Represents the progress of a task

<rp>.description: Defines what to show in browsers that do not support ruby annotations

<rt>.description: Defines an explanation/pronunciation of characters (for East Asian typography)

<ruby>.description: Defines a ruby annotation (for East Asian typography)

<s>.description: Defines text that is no longer correct

<samp>.description: Defines sample output from a computer program

<section>.description: Defines a section in a document

<slot>.description: Define una ranura, para insertar c√≥digo posteriormente, dentro de una plantilla(template)

<source>.description: Defines multiple media resources for media elements (<video> and <audio>)

<span>.description: Defines a section in a document

<strike>.description: Not supported in HTML5. Use <del> or <s> instead. Defines strikethrough text

<style>.description: Defines style information for a document

<summary>.description: Defines a visible heading for a <details> element

<svg>.description: Defines a container for SVG graphics

<tbody>.description: Groups the body content in a table

<td>.description: Defines a cell in a table

<template>.description: Defines a container for content that should be hidden when the page loads

<textarea>.description: Defines a multiline input control (text area)

<tfoot>.description: Groups the footer content in a table

<th>.description: Defines a header cell in a table

<thead>.description: Groups the header content in a table

<title>.description: Defines a title for the document

<tr>.description: Defines a row in a table

<track>.description: Defines text tracks for media elements (<video> and <audio>)

<tt>.description: Not supported in HTML5. Use CSS instead. Defines teletype text

<u>.description: Defines some text that is unarticulated and styled differently from normal text
